entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:48 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 03:56 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blizzard developing this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then a few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
